docs.title: Cardistry
docs.text: Cardistry is the performance art of card flourishing. Unlike card magic, cardistry is meant to be visually impressive and does not involve illusions or tricks.

docs.text: This section will contain: - Basic moves and techniques - Advanced flourishes - Recommended resources - Practice tips - Video tutorials

docs.title: Lacrosse
docs.text: Welcome to my lacrosse documentation! This section contains information, resources, and notes about lacrosse.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Lacrosse is a fast-paced team sport played with a stick (crosse) and a ball. Players use the stick to catch, carry, and pass the ball with the goal of scoring by shooting the ball into the opponent's goal.

docs.title: Playing Experience
docs.text:
• Positions and roles
  • Game strategies and tactics
  • Training routines and drills

docs.title: Equipment
docs.text:
• Sticks (attack, midfield, defense, goalie)
  • Protective gear
  • Ball specifications

docs.title: Skills Development
docs.text:

  • Passing and catching
  • Shooting fundamentals
  • Ground balls and loose ball recovery
  • Defensive positioning
